Applications: Quest 2 is a virtual reality headset
An ergonomic, untethered self-contained holographic device with enterprise-ready applications
build connected products that accelerate and optimize operations
enables communication between two electronic devices over a distance of 4 cm (1.57 in) or less
enable the connection between the physical and digital world by creating a communication bridge between enabled devices and the person carrying them
host web apps, mobile back ends, and RESTful APIs in the programming language of your choice without managing infrastructure
